<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class AnimationState extends ObservableComponent 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [clip](./decentraland-ecs.animationstate.clip.md) |  | <code>string</code> | Name of the animation in the model |
|  [looping](./decentraland-ecs.animationstate.looping.md) |  | <code>boolean</code> | Does the animation loop?, default: true |
|  [playing](./decentraland-ecs.animationstate.playing.md) |  | <code>boolean</code> | Is the animation playing? default: true |
|  [shouldReset](./decentraland-ecs.animationstate.shouldreset.md) |  | <code>boolean</code> | Does any anyone asked to reset the animation? default: false |
|  [speed](./decentraland-ecs.animationstate.speed.md) |  | <code>number</code> | The animation speed |
|  [weight](./decentraland-ecs.animationstate.weight.md) |  | <code>number</code> | Weight of the animation, values from 0 to 1, used to blend several animations. default: 1 |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [pause()](./decentraland-ecs.animationstate.pause.md) |  | Pauses the animation |
|  [play()](./decentraland-ecs.animationstate.play.md) |  | Starts the animation |
|  [reset()](./decentraland-ecs.animationstate.reset.md) |  | Resets the animation state to the frame 0 |
|  [setParams(params)](./decentraland-ecs.animationstate.setparams.md) |  | Sets the clip parameters |
